flexibleContent.heading: Advantages of WordPress website development services

contentLists.content: Empower localization
Code for WordPress development is free
WordPress comes with code that facilitates Google indexing
Easy availability of skilled WordPress web developers
Huge community of active WordPress developers for knowledge sharing
WordPress is compatible for mobile phones
Basic technical skills and a well-documented theme
Ease to operate and update
Easy to maintain

flexibleContent.heading: As a top-notch WordPress development company, we are committed to extending the functionality of your WordPress website.

contentLists.heading: WordPress Website Design & Development
contentLists.content: At Techtic, we only hire certified WordPress Developers so you can be confident that your website will always look great and function properly. We offer complete WordPress development services so you don’t have to worry about a thing.

contentLists.heading: WordPress Blog Development
contentLists.content: Give a personalized touch to your blogging site or create an illustrative blog with dedicated WordPress developers quickly and affordably.

contentLists.heading: WordPress CMS Development
contentLists.content: At Techtic, our WordPress developers will make it easy for you to manage your content with a well-structured WordPress CMS.

contentLists.heading: WordPress Customization
contentLists.content: Techtic is known for the finest custom WordPress website development services. We make your vision a reality with powerful technology.

contentLists.heading: WordPress eCommerce Store Development
contentLists.content: We help you mark the success of your digital store worldwide by shaping your eCommerce platform with WordPress, including all capabilities and payment methods.

contentLists.heading: WordPress Installation & Configuration
contentLists.content: When it comes to installation & Configuration, our industry wide experience and proficient WordPress development team can make it effortless.

contentLists.heading: WordPress Plugin Development
contentLists.content: Our dedicated WordPress developers can build scalable plugins tailored to your requirements that run smoothly across devices.

contentLists.heading: WordPress Theme Development
contentLists.content: Hire WordPress developers to build a unique and visually appealing WordPress theme specifically for your eCommerce store at an affordable price.

contentLists.heading: WordPress API Integration
contentLists.content: We help you expand your WordPress site’s capabilities by securely integrating internal or external APIs as required, including ERP, CRM, and more.

contentLists.heading: WordPress Maintenance
contentLists.content: Our quality analysts ensure that your website is optimized and updated at all times and ensure it has optimal performance and bug fixes.

contentLists.heading: Do you develop eCommerce website in WordPress?
contentLists.content: Yes, of course. Our team of WordPress web developers build eCommerce web store in WordPress with help from WooCommerce plugin.

contentLists.heading: Do you use Templates/Themes to design my WordPress website?
contentLists.content: No, every business deserves a unique design. We are the reliable top-notch WordPress web design agency and our WordPress designers design mockups of your WordPress website and take approval from you to start on your project.

contentLists.heading: Do you provide me support after development of WordPress Website?
contentLists.content: Yes, at Techtic Solutions, our WordPress developers are always eager to provide support and help for your requirements of new features, maintenance and regular updates.

contentLists.heading: Is there any hidden cost?
contentLists.content: TechTic Solutions believe in transparency. So, whatever price we discussed in our quote is final price. So, we are not believed in any hidden cost.

contentLists.heading: Do I own Intellectual property rights of the code of my Project?
contentLists.content: You own 100% of your project. However, the framework or the programming languages used can be open source. However, the project we build for you, and customise the bits as per your business will remain 100% your intellectual property.

contentLists.heading: Does your developed WordPress Website Mobile Friendly & Search Engine Friendly?
contentLists.content: Yes, our WordPress developers build websites that are both mobile-friendly and search engine friendly. We follow responsive website guidelines closely to ensure that our WordPress websites work well on a wide range of screen sizes, from tablets and smartphones to small and large desktop monitors. We also strictly follow all Google Webmaster and other search engine guidelines while developing WordPress websites. This way, we can be sure that our websites will be visible to potential customers who are using different devices and search engines.

contentLists.heading: Which methodologies and tools do you use to track my WordPress Website development project?
contentLists.content:
We are using Agile project development methodology for meeting deadlines. Meanwhile, we also use cutting-edge project management tools to monitor and track every phase of WordPress Website development. We build your WordPress Website on our development server, so that you can monitor the progress of your WordPress Website. Project Management Tools are:

  • Jira
  • Basecamp
  • Trello
  • Slack

contentLists.heading: What are the hiring models for WordPress Website?
contentLists.content: We offers fixed time/price model or fixed dedicated resource model for your WordPress development service. You can choose hiring model as per your project requirement.

contentLists.heading: Can you list some of your developed WordPress Website?
contentLists.content: In our 11+ yearâ€™s experience, we are design and developed 500+ WordPress Website. You can view all our WordPress Website Project at our Portfolio section.

contentLists.heading: How much does it cost to develop a WordPress Website Design & Development?
contentLists.content: The development cost of WordPress Website is totally depends upon on the requirements of the project. To know the exact details of the cost to develop a WordPress Website, get in touch with us to get estimated budget-friendly pricing or you can email us at info@techtic.com.

contentLists.heading: How much time will it take to develop a WordPress Website?
contentLists.content: It depends on a few different things. It all boils down to the size of your WordPress website, the type of custom WordPress development process you’re going for, as well as other outside factors such as what kind of features and functionalities you want for your site. If you need a more specific answer, shoot us an email with your WordPress development requirements at info@techtic.com or give us a call today – we would be more than happy to help!
